page.title: 13LIFE STYLE
page.content: {A Day In My Life My name is Charlotte Rooke.I am ten years old.I go to Elsecar C.E. School.I get up at 08.00.For breakfast I have Weetabix and then some toast. Then I go into the bathroom and get washed.Our School starts at 08.55.We go into our classrooms and start reading.It is assembly at 09.15. The headteacher talks to us in assembly and tells us a story and then we say prayers.It is 10.00 when we come out of assembly and get back to our lessons.We do a lot of mathematics and work in our jotters.At 11.55 it is dinner time. Nearly all of my friends stay for dinner but I go home and have a sandwich and a bottle of pop. I come back to school at 12.30 and I start playing in the yard.At 13.15 we go in for lessons.At 14.40 we have our playtime.Then we do more work or P.E.
